definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: H2S has a distinctive offensive smell, similar to "rotten eggs".
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢有一种令人讨厌的臭鸡蛋气味。

sentences.english: They would have been belching hydrogen sulfide and other gases.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以喷出硫化氢和其它的气体。

sentences.english: The reaction at the surfacealso makes hydrogen sulfide eruptions visible in satellite imagery.
sentences.chinese: 在水表的这一反应也使硫化氢喷发可见于卫星图像。

sentences.english: They feed on hydrogen sulphide in oxygen-starvedwaters in a band off Peru and Chile.
sentences.chinese: 它们在秘鲁和智利一带缺氧的水域以硫化氢为食。

sentences.english: These bacteria emit hydrogen sulfide gas as a by-product.
sentences.chinese: 这些细菌排放的硫化氢气体是其分解过程的副产品。

sentences.english: For welding the corrode resisting steel with Mo, V or Low-Al etc.
sentences.chinese: 高温硫，硫化氢腐蚀用钢的焊接。

sentences.english: The hydrogen sulfide test is negative. Its capsular antigen belongs to Carter's type B.
sentences.chinese: 试验阴性，不产生硫化氢，荚膜型为B型。

sentences.english: If the combination of gases that make up a fart includes a significant amount of hydrogen sulfide, then it will stink.
sentences.chinese: 如屁的组成气体中包含大量的硫化氢，就会发臭。

sentences.english: The gas builds on the ocean floor until it erupts suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢气体在海底聚集直到突然喷发。

sentences.english: Hydrogen sulfide corrosion is one of main reasons which caused sewer deterioration.
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢腐蚀是造成排水管道损坏的主要原因之一。
